title: The Top 10 Funniest Cat Videos On YouTube
summary: Maru: Master of the Vertical Jump - This little Scottish Fold kitty from Japan is a real star. Shiba Confessionals - Definitely not for the faint of heart! Kitten Wars - Kitten humor mixed with a dash of cringe Kitty make-up sessions with Blink Beauty. Jumping Cats â€“ Normal Cat Behavior Explained - It's not what you think! intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Why do crazy cat people love their cats so much? Because their cats are hilarious. With their constant sneering and condescending glares, feline friends have a knack for being entertaining in the most ridiculous ways. So, if you need a break from those stressful final exam cram sessions, we've compiled a list of the top 10 funniest cat videos on YouTube. From silly cats to crafty cats and everything in between, these videos will give you some much-needed LOLs.
Cat videos are one of the most popular video niches online today. There are several channels on YouTube that are dedicated only to cat videos and nothing else. In this post we\u2019ll look at some of the best channels that feature nothing but cat content \u2013 be it funny cat vines or cute cat compilations \u2013 as well as some of our favorite individual clips from these creators.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Get over a Break-Up

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`In the unfortunate event that you find yourself in a situation where you need to get over a break-up, it\u2019s important to know what to do in order to help the healing process along. Break-ups are never easy, and they can be even more difficult and hurtful if it\u2019s with your first love or someone you really cared about. These tips will help get you through any heartbreak and back into a place of peace.
When you experience a break-up, whether it\u2019s from a partner, friend or family member, it leaves you with an empty feeling. It hurts so much because you placed so many emotions into the relationship that it now feels like a part of who you are has been taken from you. Even though the person who broke up with you may have been oblivious to the pain they were causing by ending things, that doesn\u2019t make breaking up any easier for anyone involved.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Top 10 Best Cat Breeds in the World

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Cats are mysterious creatures, it\u2019s almost impossible to know what they\u2019re thinking. But that hasn\u2019t stopped cat lovers from all over the world falling head over heels in love with these cuddly felines. Whether you like them for their beauty, intelligence or simply for their cuteness, there is no denying that cats make wonderful pets.
There are a wide range of different breeds of cat but generally speaking there are two main categories; longhaired and shorthaired cats. Within these two groups there are numerous sub-groups and hybrids with specific traits from different types of cat \u2013 check out this article to learn more about the basic types of cat!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 5 Ways to Cut down on Screen Time
How to Train Your Dog to Toilet Outside

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Your dog might have been house-trained as a puppy, but that doesn\u2019t mean they won\u2019t have accidents as an adult. Maybe you\u2019ve just moved to a new home and your dog hasn\u2019t gotten used to the new smells yet, or maybe he has medical issues that are causing him to have accidents. Whatever the reason, if your dog is having accidents in the house it can be distressing for both of you. However, with time and patience you can help your dog learn again how to toilet outside.
There are various reasons why a dog may stop using the indoor toilet. It may be as simple as them not liking it because of its location or smell or because there\u2019s another person or animal living in the house now who they don\u2019t like seeing when they do their business.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Stay Organized and Sane as a Busy Mom
How to Make Your Resolution to Get Fit a Reality
5 Ways to Reduce Stress during the Holiday Season

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Mediation is a great way to resolve your legal dispute, but it\u2019s not right for everyone. If you\u2019re eligible to mediate, that might depend on the type of case you have and who you are. For example, there may be other requirements that you meet to qualify as an eligible candidate.
Mediation eligibility can differ depending on whether the dispute resolution program requires participants to be from a certain income level or has other prerequisites such as being a homeowner or having a specific legal status. You should also keep in mind that some programs may require mediation only when parties can\u2019t agree on a settlement and not necessarily as an initial step in their process for resolving disputes. Read on for more information about who can mediate and what factors may impact your ability to participate in this alternative dispute resolution process.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Deal with a Partner Who's Always Travelling

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Mediation is a process that helps people resolve conflicts and find solutions to difficult problems. It\u2019t not the same thing as arbitration or negotiation. Mediation is a voluntary process in which a neutral third party, the mediator, assists others in exploring issues, managing conflict, and solving problems in an effort to resolve conflict and move forward. The parties involved in the dispute remain control over their own destiny at all times. They are free to walk away from mediation at any time with no consequence. The goal of mediation is not compromise but resolution. It\u2019t win-win or lose-lose but instead find a place somewhere between those two extremes where both parties can feel satisfied with the outcome of their dispute.  Mediation services are often provided by private organizations such as nonprofit community mediation centers or faith-based centers that offer these services pro bono publico, which means \u201Cfor the good of the public\u201D without charge."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
